outputs.output_descr: The objective of this project is to define long term national strategic actions to build up a pact between society and the State referring to values, ways and solutions to achieve these strategic objectives; create conditions for the institutionalization of the strategic management of the long term national objectives. This project aims aldo, at medium term, to propose a positive scenario for Brasil, as a society satisfactorilly developed, fully democratic and equal, holder of citizenship inclusive values, inserted in a sovereign way in the world's economy and participating in the international decision making processes.

subnational.name: Nucleo de Assuntos Estrategicos da Presidencia da Republica, Brasilia, Brazil
